document.full_text: president barack obama on tuesday urged european countries and bondholders to prevent a "disastrous" default by greece and pledged u.s. support to help tackle the country's debt crisis.
document.title: obama presses europe, pledges help for greek crisis
lines_and_colors: president barack obama on tuesday urged european countries and bondholders to prevent a "disastrous" default by greece and pledged u.s. support to help tackle the country's debt crisis.
